pageContext.claim: “The United States also has far and away the most robust testing capacity in the world. Testing has been incredible, what we've been able to do. Nobody is even close. Since March 12th, we've increased daily testing by 32,000 percent.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump marks the necessary increase as an achievement, but every country around the world had to build and scale testing infrastructure for the novel coronavirus. Some countries are testing at higher rates than the U.S.
